name: From Beyond the Stars (Gabriel_216)
description:
Explore a mysterious giant cube that appeared out of nowhere in space, among the stars.

Created for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6.

Soundtrack : Get Out,  Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.

CONTROLS

Move: AWSD

Shoot: Mouse Left Button

Run: Shift

Flashlight: F

Interact: E

Throw Item: Space

Pause: Esc
